body.p: June 7, 2014, Toronto - Presented by the Canada China Capital Market Access Corporation (CCCMAC), supported by Happy Life Wealth Management and Fame Club, the Mining Investment and Financing 101 seminar was successfully held in Markham on June 7.

CCCMAC invited Mr. Richard Jozefacki, Investment Advisor at EuroPacific Securities, Mr. Bob Perry, retired management member of listing department of Toronto Stock Exchange, and Mr. Alar Soever, the Executive Chairman of Wallbridge Mining Company Limited and Chairman of Miocene Metals Limited to share their over-decade experience and expertise on mining investment to the participants. They covered a wide range of theory, practical insight and case examples, and drew a positive discussion and exchange among participants, which is also the purpose and mission of CCCMAC in organizing this type of small focused seminars.

This is the fourth Educational seminar organized by Canada China Capital Market Access Corporation (a non-for-profit organization). Our goal is to help Canadian Chinese immigrates and businessmen to better understand Canadian capital market structure and find good investment opportunities.
